name: The Knights of Dice
description:
The Knights of Dice:

Dive into the world of abstractness and chance! You are a triangle fighting for survival, striving to become the strongest shape in the entire world.

Controls:  [wasd/point-and-click] to move, [left mouse button] to attack, [tab/m] to show the map, [esc] to exit the game

For best experience, please download the game below!

Note: This game was finished in a hurry, and is more of a prototype. There is no win condition, but I would say defeating a Triangulus (a yellow enemy) would be a good goal to reach.

Created for an Extra Credits Bootleg Jam
